Literature Review: Machine learning (ML) has revolutionized the field of earthquake seismology, enabling researchers to develop a deeper understanding of seismic phenomena and improve predictive capabilities. The integration of ML methods with traditional seismological techniques has led to significant advancements in earthquake monitoring, data processing, and analysis. This review aims to provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of ML in earthquake seismology, discuss the progress and challenges, and offer suggestions for future research.
